posts.post_content: Must be well centered with good eye appeal.  Also, I prefer higher graded PSA examples.  PM with any you are willing to sell.
I posted a T206 Cobb bat off shoulder in PSA 3.5 couple posts below yours if interested.

Have this nice young for trade towards cobb red portrait, also would consider selling.  Let me know if interested.  Thanks
